title: ITC exploring hotel business expansion opportunity in Nepal, Sri Lanka, Middle East
description: Chairman and managing director Sanjiv Puri said ITC is looking to add more than 70 hotels over the next five years in India, mostly through management contracts. Its next greenfield hotel property will open in the coastal city of Puri in Odisha.
